gobblin.metastore

Class DatabaseJobHistoryStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • gobblin.metastore.DatabaseJobHistoryStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JobHistoryStore, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class DatabaseJobHistoryStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements JobHistoryStore
    An implementation of JobHistoryStore backed by MySQL.

    The DDLs for the MySQL job history store can be found under metastore/src/main/resources.
